pages.text: 25|44|Soretomo kare-ra no ōku wa mimi o katamuke, matawa satoru to demo omotte iru no ka. Kare-ra wa kachiku no yōna mono ni suginai. Iya, sore yori mo michi kara mayotte iru.
25|45|Omo wa ikaga ni kage o hiroge rareta ka, anata wa minakatta no ka. Moshi kare ga o nozominaraba, sore o seishishita mama ni sa reyou. Sorekara ware wa, taiyō o sono an'nai-yaku to shita.
25|46|Sokode ware wa, yuruyakana ashidori de ware no kata ni hikiyoseru.
25|47|Kare koso wa, anata gata no tame ni yoru o tobari to sa re, suimin shite kyūsoku sa se, hiruma o yomigaeri (no toki) to nasa reta okatadearu.
25|48|Mata kare koso wa, sono jiu o furasu mae ni, kippō no kaze o fuki okosu okatadearu. Soshite ware wa, ten kara seijōna ame o furasu.
25|49|Ware wa sore de shinda daichi ni seimei o atae, mata ware ga tsukutta musū no kachiku ya ningen ni noma sete yaru.
25|50|Ware wa kare-ra ga kidzuku yō ni, kare-ra no ma de kore o kurikaeshi (te kaimei shi)ta. Daga dai tasū no ningen wa, tada kobamu dakedeatta.
25|51|Ware ga moshi nozomunaraba, dono machi ni mo keikoku-sha o 1-ri dzutsu tsukawashitadearou.
25|52|Dakara fushin-sha ni shitagatte wa naranai. Kare-ra ni taishi kono (kuruān) o motte ōini funtō doryoku shi nasai.
25|53|Kare koso wa, futatsunoumi o wake hedate rareta okatadearu. Hitotsu wa amaku shite umai,-gai wa shiokaraku shite nigai. Ryōsha no ma ni shōheki o mōke, kanzen ni bunri nasa reta.
25|54|Kare koso wa, mizu kara ningen o tsukuri, kettō ni yoru shinzoku to kon'in no kankei o sadame rareta kata. Hontōni anata no omo wa zen'nō de ara reru.
25|55|Daga kare-ra wa arrā o sashioite mueki mugai no mono ni tsukaeru. Hontōni fushin-sha wa, jibun no omo ni hankō suru mono (akuma) no enjo-shadearu.
